text: What was once a thriving metropolis now stands in ruins, a testament to the brutality of urban warfare.
Our unit was sent in to clear the remaining hostiles, moving cautiously through streets we once swore to protect.
Gunfire erupted from windows above, forcing us to take defensive positions.
We pushed forward through the chaos, each step bringing us deeper into the heart of the conflict.
Our team breached a building where hostages were being held, every second critical to their survival.
From my position, I could spot enemy movements across the devastated landscape.
Then came the explosion that changed everything.
We rushed to evacuate him through the contested streets, every moment under fire.
His last words were for his family as we carried him to safety.
Today, I stand alone at the memorial for those we lost in that forgotten city battle, their sacrifice etched into my memory forever.
